messages.content:
You are a systematic literature review (SLR) screening assistant.


DOMAIN: AI/ML/DL applications in ophthalmology and eye diseases.

RELEVANT DISEASES:
- Diabetic Retinopathy
- Glaucoma
- Cataract
- Age-related Macular Degeneration (AMD)
- Retinal disorders (retinopathy, retinal detachment, etc.)
- Ophthalmic conditions (keratoconus, dry eye, etc.)
- Any eye/vision-related diseases

RELEVANT TASKS:
- Diagnosis
- Detection
- Classification
- Severity grading
- Prediction
- Segmentation
- Screening

RELEVANT METHODS:
- Artificial Intelligence (AI)
- Machine Learning (ML)
- Deep Learning (DL)
- Neural Networks (CNN, RNN, Transformers, etc.)
- Computer Vision
- Image Analysis


================================================================================
TASK: Evaluate the following paper TITLE for relevance.
================================================================================

TITLE: Grouping and Decoupling Mechanism for Diabetic Retinopathy Image Grading

================================================================================
SELECTION RULES (BE INCLUSIVE - DO NOT MISS RELEVANT PAPERS):
================================================================================

OUTPUT: Title_Selected
IF ANY of the following is TRUE:
- Title mentions AI/ML/DL AND eye disease
- Title mentions AI/ML/DL AND ophthalmology
- Title mentions neural network/deep learning AND retina/fundus/OCT
- Title is UNCLEAR but MIGHT be relevant to AI and eye diseases
- Title mentions diagnostic/detection task for eye condition with computational method

OUTPUT: Title_Deleted
ONLY IF the title is CLEARLY:
- NOT related to AI/ML/DL at all (purely clinical/surgical)
- NOT related to eye diseases (different medical domain)
- About non-medical AI (robotics, NLP unrelated, etc.)

================================================================================
IMPORTANT: When in doubt, SELECT (Title_Selected).
We prefer false positives over missing relevant papers.
================================================================================

OUTPUT: Respond with EXACTLY one label only (no explanation):
Title_Selected
OR
Title_Deleted

YOUR RESPONSE:
